description: flip a coin for a chance to double gems.

name: punishments
description: View the punishments for a user.

choices.name: Nickname
choices.value: No blank, inappropriate, or offensive nicknames are allowed

choices.name: Pingable Names
choices.value: All names must be pingable

choices.name: Politcal / Contraversial
choices.value: Political/Controversial conversations are strictly prohibited in our server

choices.name: Professional / Courteous
choices.value: Please try to act professional and courteous in our server

choices.name: Role Begging
choices.value: No Begging for roles

choices.name: Ghost | Random | Spam pings
choices.value: No ghost pings / Random Pings / Spam Pinging

choices.name: Ministry
choices.value: No Insulting the Minsitry

choices.name: Link Appropiate
choices.value: Links are not allowed to lead to pages that include inappropriate content

choices.name: Appropiate Media
choices.value: All forms of media posted in our server must be appropriate

choices.name: invite-links
choices.value: Links can only include invites to Wolf-Co approved servers.

choices.name: anti-ministry
choices.value: No Media is allowed to contain anti-Ministry content.
